title: GVKinLink
summary:
A private space where your family connects, remembers, and grows together.
Build your family tree, share memories, and link generations ‚Äî forever.
body:
A private family networking platform where users:

  • Build and visualize their family tree (with modern, interactive design).

  • Connect relatives (both close and distant) like a ‚Äúprivate Facebook for your family.‚Äù

  • Share photos, stories, milestones, or documents (weddings, heritage, etc.).

  • Manage heritage data (birthdays, death anniversaries, important family events).

  • Invite relatives securely, ensuring only family members can access.

Essentially:
üß¨ Ancestry.com + Facebook + Family Album, but private and modern.
